title: Confetti Cannon
summaries: The Confetti Cannon is a Hardmode novelty mechanism item that fires Confetti. It produces only visual effects, and causes no damage to players or enemies. It is purchased from the Party Girl for 25, when the Pirate is present.

The Confetti Cannon functions similarly to the Cannon or Bunny Cannon: It must be placed and clicked (⚒ Use / Attack) while holding Confetti as the active hotbar item. It can be aimed by right-clicking (⚷ Open / Activate) its left or right side. It can also be wired similarly: Depending on where the wire is connected, it will either fire, or rotate toward the side the wire is on.
